prompts: Create a fiery bird Pokemon with a vibrant orange body and striking yellow accents.
I want to see a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a fighter, with bright colors and dynamic poses.
Generate a middle evolution fire-type Pokemon that features a unique blend of yellow and orange.
Make an energetic Pokemon that showcases its fierce fighting style through its distinct colors and shape.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon with fiery feathers and a strong stance, ready for battle.
Design a Pokemon that has a playful yet determined personality, represented through its color scheme.
Show me a vibrant fire-type Pokemon that combines both agility and strength in its appearance.
